title: Perth Scorchers Claim Historic Sixth BBL Title at Optus Stadium
details: The Perth Scorchers have reaffirmed their dominance in the Big Bash League by defeating the Sydney Sixers by 6 wickets to claim their sixth title...

title: Rajshahi Warriors Clinch BPL 2026 Trophy with Dominant Final Win
details: Rajshahi Warriors were crowned champions of the 12th BPL season after a 63-run victory over Chattogram Royals in Mirpur...

title: Hobart Hurricanes Women Secure Maiden WBBL|11 Championship
details: The Hobart Hurricanes made history by winning their first-ever WBBL title, defeating the Perth Scorchers Women by 8 wickets...

title: ICC Expels Bangladesh from T20 World Cup 2026 Amid Security Stance
details: In a major blow to world cricket, the ICC has expelled Bangladesh from the upcoming Men's T20 World Cup...
